description: If you are interested in become a legal firearms dealer or manufacturer. You will be able to apply to become a firearms and manufacturer by end of this course. You will need to submit this form to the ATF. This training course is quick and simple which will help you onto the path to gain your license. Most people were nervous and thought there were a lot of guidelines to jump through to get a Federal Firearms License. Matter of fact getting the license is a very simple process. I owned a gun shop before moving to California and the paperwork for the ATF is very simple. The record keeping is the difficult part.
title: How to Get Your Federal Firearms License
